titleStmt.title: Of the heart and its right soveraign, and Rome no mother-church to England, or, An historical account of the title of our British Church, and by what ministry the Gospel was first planted in every country with a remembrance of the rights of Jerusalem above, in the great question, where is the true mother-church of Christians? / by T.J.
titleStmt.author: Jones, Thomas, 1622?-1682.

publicationStmt.publisher: Printed for Edw. Foulkes, and are to be sold by T. Basset,

notesStmt.note: Reproduction of original in the British Library.
